question: Who has been elected as the Chairman of Boao Forum recently?
explanation: Former UN Secretary General Ban Ki-moon was elected as Chairman of Boao Forum for Asia replacing Japan's Yasuo Fukuda. Former governor of People's Bank of China Zhou Xiaochuan was appointed vice-chairman. Both the appointments took place during second session of annual Boao Forum, known as "Asian Davos" underway in China's Hainan province. Ban Ki-moon is South Korean diplomat and was eighth Secretary-General of United Nations from January 2007 to December 2016.
